title: 4.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Discuss with your friends about some common animals and their homes. Select some of them. Draw their homes using different tools you have practiced in Tux paint. Use the Stamp tool to place the drawing of each animal besides its home.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
